allow:
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" -U postgres -h localhost -d sports_management -c "
-- Check for users without roles
SELECT COUNT(*) as users_without_roles
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id
WHERE ur.user_id IS NULL;

-- Show some example users with their roles
SELECT u.email, STRING_AGG(r.name, '', '') as roles
FROM users u
JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id
JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id
WHERE ur.is_active = true
GROUP BY u.email
ORDER BY u.email
LIMIT 15;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" -U postgres -h localhost -d sports_management -c "
SELECT email, 
  CASE 
    WHEN password_hash LIKE ''$2%'' THEN ''bcrypt hash (valid)''
    ELSE ''invalid/missing''
  END as password_status
FROM users
WHERE email IN (''admin@refassign.com'', ''admin@test.com'', ''referee@test.com'')
ORDER BY email;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" -U postgres -h localhost -d sports_management -c "
SELECT u.id, u.email, u.name, STRING_AGG(r.name, '', '') as roles
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id
LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id
WHERE LOWER(u.name) LIKE ''%system%'' OR LOWER(u.email) LIKE ''%system%''
GROUP BY u.id, u.email, u.name
ORDER BY u.email;
")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" -U postgres -h localhost -d sports_management -c "SELECT id, email, name, organization_id FROM users WHERE email = ''admin@refassign.com'';")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" -U postgres -h localhost -d sports_management -c "SELECT DISTINCT r.name as role_name FROM roles r ORDER BY r.name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres123 "/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql" -U postgres -h localhost -d sports_management -c "SELECT u.email, STRING_AGG(r.name, '', '') as roles FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.is_active = true GROUP BY u.email ORDER BY u.email LIMIT 10;")
